Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO. 33 XIERQI MIDDLE ROAD,BUILDING E, XIAOMI SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY PARK, BEIJING, 100085, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kingsoft Cloud Holdings Ltd is an independent cloud service provider in China. The company has built a cloud platform consisting of cloud infrastructure, cloud products and industry-specific solutions across public cloud, enterprise cloud, and IoT cloud services. Its products and services are categorized in compute, networking, storage and delivery, database, data analysis, security, video services, and developer services. Geographically, the firm operates in China.
